description:
In this talk Simon will explain where AI excels, how to implement it and what pitfalls to look out for.

He will cover challenges such as bias and explainability and what aspects of data governance you need to worry about.

There will be plenty of time to have your questions answered in an interactive Fishbowl discussion with Simon and other members of the Equal Experts Data Practice.

SPEAKER:
Simon Case
Data Practice Lead, Equal Experts.

***
This talk will be recorded and the link to the recording placed in the Comments shortly after the event takes place.
***
title: Applying AI: how to get the best from your data
